I think it would be useful if ZeroNet didn't always run on port 15441, but [optionally] chose a random non-privileged port at startup.

I believe instances announce themselves to [trackers ü°ï](https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/ZeroNet/blob/master/src/Config.py#L32), so shouldn't they be able to announce both their IP address and their port?
